text:
I don't have or use 22H2/23H2
myself to confirm but you can easily enumerate installed updates inside
winre.wim without mounting: dism.exe /List-Image /ImageFile:winre.wim /Index:1 |
findstr /i "Package_for_.*.mum"

metadata.topic: Win11 22h2 and later - they don't need 250 free? Yes? No? and what about checking if you are patched? (aka I'm confused)
